#summary How to extract archives of different formats (lzma, gzip, rar,zip).

= Compression Methods =

There are several different [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Compression_algorithm compression algorithms], and several software applications for compressing and decompressing data according to those algorithms, among them `lzma`, `gzip`, `rar`, `tar` and `zip`. Usually `tar` and `gzip` are available on Linux systems without need of installation. On most Linux systems one can have `lzma`, `rar` or `zip` installed using `apt-get`, `synaptic`, `aptitude`, `yum` or equivalent package management software.
